title: (Locked) Riot Bans
body: I have been playing League of Legends for over 7 years, last night was my second account banned permanently, Riot does not understand that just few times if you tell someone he must not play ranked and flame him his useless shit friends same category as him can troll your game report you and you get banned, solution for flamers could be permanent chat restriction after verifying the whole game, which Riot as company can never do that, this  company should make solution about not allowing total unskilled brainless ppls join ranked games, and not permanent ban ppls who "flame", because only the ones who get 10x in a row from series of promotion to demotion know the struggle, I didn't play ranked for a year to train after my first bad game on ranked, and I said sorry instead of reporting the one who told me I am bad and flamed me, I totally understood him how he was feeling, same way I feel when I see crap players on ranked games, I should not play ranked until I learn, but some pieces of shit can not admit they worth shit as human being and they will report you for telling them the truth, hope one day Riot will change their policy of banning, I will make new accs always and always tell worthless pieces of shit that they need to learn use brain first then play war/strategy games, I don't intend to stop flaming or stop playing League, until pieces of shit understands to say sorry when they are wrong and not threat they will report you because you tell them the truth.

replies.body: I am locking this thread, because at this point it has derailed into insults and flaming. The original question was answered months ago and there's no need to have a flame war.

Riot has already tried permanent chat restrictions, almost every person that was affected switched to gameplay trolling, which was not a tradeoff Riot was willing to accept.

When people are doing poorly in your games they already know they are doing poorly. You are not giving them any info they don't already have, you are just being an asshole for the sake of being an asshole. Riot does not want you playing their game ruining the experiences of other people so you will continue to be banned as long as you keep that up. If you are willing to keep making new accounts then w/e but you will eventually get tired of it and leave or change your behavior. Might as well make it sooner rather than later so you lose as little progress as possible.
